Myrmidon just shook his head as Malice totally missed his point. He did not=
 mean give as material gain, he meant leadership, honor, victory. If Megatr=
on was like this one , wanting a body count, then they were just like shark=
ticons, fighting for nothing, winning nothing, omly falling victim of the w=
hims of fate.

Even as Perceptor reactivated the power within the chamber a=
nd began to blast at Malice, Myrmidon sighed, "I had hopes for you. Perhaps=
 Megatron would be better."

Myrmidon stepped in front of Malice, just on t=
he other side of the shield. "If battle is all you desire, then you shall h=
ave it." With  a thought Myrmidon's blade appeared as he again orientd his =
twin motar cannons on Malice, setting them to fire the moment the shielding=
 dropped. 

Myrmidon set himself, and waited.

Preston 
(Myrmidon)
